item.description:
Seth has graciously opened his house to the Rhode Island Atheist Society for dinner and a movie on Friday, September 10th!

We will be viewing Monty Python's "Life of Brian" and partaking in spaghetti and turkey meatballs that Seth is also going to prepare. I thought it might be nice if the rest of the participants could volunteer to bring bread, salad, or dessert to round out the dinner.

We're capping this event at 20 people so please respond early to save your space - and let us know if you would like to contribute to the dinner.

Please let me know if you have any questions - hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email the address to participants several days prior to the get together.
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society - Movie Night!
